Verses: 1 parisuththavaangalukku Seyyavendiya Dharmasagaayaththaikkuriththu, Naan Adhigamaaga Ungalukku Ezhudhavenduvadhillai.

2 ungal Manaviruppaththai Arindhirukkiren; Agaayaavilullavargal Oruvarushamaaga Aayaththamaayirukkiraargalendru Naan Makkedhoniyarudane Solli, Ungalaip Pugazhndhene; Ungal Jaakkiradhai Anegarai Ezhuppivittadhumundu.
3 appadiyirundhum, Ungalaikkuriththu Naangal Sonna Pugazhchchi Indhak Kaariyaththil Veenaaippogaamal, Naan Sonnapadi Neengal Aayaththappattavargalaayiruppadharku, Indha Sagodhararai Anuppinen.

4 makkedhoniyar Ennudanekooda Vandhu, Ungalai Aayaththappadaadhavargalaagak Kandaal, Ivvalavu Nichchayamaai Ungalaip Pugazhndhadharkaaga, Neengal Vetkappaduveergalendru Naangal Sollaamal, Naangale Vetkappadavendiyadhaayirukkum.

5 aagaiyaal, Vaakkuththaththam Pannappattirukkira Ungal Thaanadharmamaanadhu Lobaththanamaaik Kodukkappattadhaayiraamal, Udhaaraththuvamaaik Kodukkappattadhaayirukkumpadiyaaga Adhai Aayaththappaduththugiradharku Sagodhararai Evi, Ungalidaththil Munnadhaaga Anuppuvadhu Enakku Avasiyam Endru Kaanappattadhu.
6 pinnum Naan Sollugiradhennavenil, Siruga Vidhaikkiravan Siruga Aruppaan, Peruga Vidhaikkiravan Peruga Aruppaan.
7 avanavan Visanamaayumalla, Kattaayamaayumalla, Than Manadhil Niyamiththapadiye Kodukkakkadavan; Urchaagamaaik Kodukkiravanidaththil Dhevan Piriyamaayirukkiraar.

8 melum, Neengal Ellaavatrilum Eppozhudhum Sambooranamudaiyavargalaayum, Sagalavidha Narkiriyaigalilum Perugugiravargalaayumirukkumpadiyaaga, Dhevan Ungalidaththil Sagalavidha Kirubaiyaiyum Perugachcheyya Vallavaraayirukkiraar.
9 vaariyiraiththaan, Ezhaigalukkuk Koduththaan, Avanudaiya Neethi Endrendraikkum Nirkum Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiyaagum.
10 vidhaikkiravanukku Vidhaiyaiyum, Pusikkiradharku Aagaaraththaiyum Alikkiravar Ungalukku Vidhaiyai Aliththu, Adhaip Perugappanni, Ungal Needhiyin Vilaichchalai Varththikka Seyvaar.
11 dhevanukku Engalaal Sthoththiramundaavadharku Edhuvaayirukkum Migundha Udhaaragunaththile Neengal Evvidhaththilum Sambooranamullavargalaaveergal.
12 indha Dharmasagaayamaagiya Panividai Parisuththavaangaludaiya Kuraivugalai Neekkugiradhumallaamal, Anegar Dhevanai Sthoththirippadhinaale Sambooranapalanulladhaayum Irukkum.

13 avargal Indha Dharmasagaayaththinaalaagiya Nanmaiyai Anubaviththu, Neengal Kiristhuvin Suviseshaththaik Keezhppadidhalode Arikkaiyittirukkiradhinimiththamum, Thangalukkum Matra Anaivarukkum Neengal Udhaaraththuvamaaith Dharmanseygiradhinimiththamum, Avargal Dhevanai Magimaippaduththi;
14 ungalukkaaga Vendudhalseydhu, Dhevan Ungalukku Aliththa Migavum Viseshiththa Kirubaiyinimiththam Ungalmel Vaanjaiyaayirukkiraargal.
15 dhevan Aruliya Sollimudiyaadha Eevukkaaga Avarukku Sthoththiram.
